publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2362 Miss Annabel Goldie: Job Losses in the West of Scotland—That the Parliament notes with concern the escalating job losses in the West of Scotland culminating in the recent announcements from Rolls Royce in Hillington and Robinson Nugent and Compaq in Inchinnan that further losses may be expected and calls upon the Scottish Executive, the affected companies and all local and other relevant agencies to unite in seeking to maintain economic activity in Renfrewshire and to offer every assistance to those who lose jobs to find new jobs. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) John Young*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Brian Adam*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Hugh Henry*
S1M-2362 Job Losses in the West of Scotland (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
